backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that manages contact inquiries with CRUD operations (submit, get all, get by ID, delete) using a Map store and auto-incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (language selection, hero section, classes section, contact form) to their corresponding source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a reference summary for the project's frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, destructive, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to the school name and mounting the app at the root div via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the app in LanguageProvider and renders all page sections (Hero, About, Classes, Contact, Footer) with smooth scroll navigation via section refs.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Renders the About section with a title, description, and two cards displaying the school's Mission and Vision in the selected language.
frontend/src/components/ClassCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying a single class's name, age range, description, highlight, and subjects with per-index color theming.
frontend/src/components/ClassesSection.t: Renders the Classes section with a heading and a responsive grid of ClassCard components for all five classes using translated data.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: React Hook Form-based contact form with fields for name, email, phone, subject, and message; submits to the backend canister and shows a success confirmation state.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders the contact section with address, phone, and hours info cards alongside the ContactForm component in a two-column layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with school info, quick navigation links, contact details, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with school logo, desktop and mobile navigation menus, and a language toggle button.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section displaying a banner image with overlay text, a tagline, subtitle, and CTA buttons for classes and contact navigation.
frontend/src/components/LanguageModal.ts: Full-screen modal shown on first visit prompting the user to select English or Hindi as their preferred language.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Small toggle button in the header that switches the app language between English and Hindi.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context provider that manages the selected language state, persisting the choice to sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom hook and provider that manage Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient, exposing identity, login/clear functions, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a `useSubmitContactInquiry` mutation hook that submits contact form data to the backend actor and invalidates the `contactInquiries` query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Provides a `useTranslation` hook that returns the current language's translation object and language code from the LanguageContext.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for translation data and exports English and Hindi translation objects covering nav, hero, about, classes, contact, footer, and language-selection UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines CSS custom properties for the warm saffron/green/cream color theme in light and dark modes, and adds utility classes for school-specific colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom school fonts (Playfair Display, Noto Sans), saffron/green/cream color palette, border radii, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the multilingual school website for Dwarika Mohini Medha Montesary School, listing implemented features, architectural notes, image requirements, and known issues.
